name: La Passion de nostre seigneur ihesus christ
maker: Master of Guillaume Lambert and workshop, Attributed to Jean Gerson
description: La Passion de nostre seigneur ihesus christ; Master of Guillaume Lambert and workshop (French, active about 1475 - 1485), Attributed to Jean Gerson (French, 1363 - 1429); Lyon, France; about 1480 - 1490; Tempera colors, gold and silver paints, silver leaf, and black ink on parchment bound between pasteboard covered with red morocco; Leaf: 30.5 × 21.6 cm (12 × 8 1/2 in.); Ms. 25; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: La Passion de nostre seigneur ihesus christ
medium: Tempera colors, gold and silver paints, silver leaf, and black ink on parchment bound between pasteboard covered with red morocco
